MADRS_Total.Description: Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) score total. Survey publication: https://doi.org/10.1192/bjp.134.4.382

HAMD_Bech.Description: The score of the abbreviated Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression (HAMD-6), a shorter version of the HAMD-17 scale. It measures only depressed mood (item 1), guilt (Item 2), work and activities (Item 7), retardation (Item 8), anxiety psychic (Item 10), and general somatic symptoms (Item 13). According to the DSM-IV criteria, these six selected HAMD-17 items represent the core symptoms of major depression. Survey publication: https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1600-0447.2008.01289.x

HAM17_Total.Description: The score on the first 17 questions of the Hamilton Depression Rating Scale (HAMD-17). Survey publication: https://doi.org/10.1111/j.2044-8260.1967.tb00530.x
